medical_history.chief_complaint: Fatigue, myalgias, migraines, generalized anxiety, decreased libido, paresthesias, polydipsia, polyuria, trace peripheral edema, heart palpitations, and shortness of breath.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms have been present for the previous 2 years, with a 1-month unexplained weight gain (3 kg) prior to presentation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of presumed essential hypertension for 6 years and hypokalemia.
